After trying to rectify the errors several times, I tried to do the whole docker setup from the beginning. I am at the stage of

`baila@baila-PC:~$ docker run --runtime=nvidia --rm nvidia/cuda nvidia-smi`

`baila@baila-PC:~$`

‌
